column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Wonderfully flavored small bites. Ordered the seafood paella
column2: buttermilk fried chicken and Peri-peri sauce (wonderfully delicious and well-balanced)
column3: and the beef empanada. Ordered pitchers of red and white sangrias and was left wanting. The sangria was lacking depth of flavor and balance between sweet and dry
column4: tasted like diluted fruit juice. Service was reasonably timely
column6: and a generally pleasant dining experience.
